short_summary: Call for contractors for RFSO for Printing of Marine Charts for CHS.
description: create nautical charts and publications that meet the requirements of the Navigation Safety Regulations, 2020
full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer (RFSA)

**Title**
* The Canadian Hydrographic Service (CHS) of Fisheries and Oceans Canada is seeking up to five contractors to provide nautical charts and publications that meet the requirements of the Navigation Safety Regulations, 2020, supported under the Canada Shipping Act, 2001.

**Tender Details**

* **Reference Number**: cb-161-12472855
* **Amendment Number**: 5
* **Solicitation Number**: 30004981
* **Publication Date**: 2024-02-27
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-03-25, 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-05-01
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2028-04-30

**Notice Type**
* **Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Description**
The CHS of Fisheries and Oceans Canada requires contractors to provide on-demand printing services to meet the specific needs of their nautical charts and publications. This Standing Offer Agreement will be awarded for a period of four years, with the option to extend the call-up procedures for up to four subsequent years. The objective is to award up to five contracts to qualified suppliers who can respond to the specific needs of the CHS.

**Eligibility Criteria**
* Suppliers must meet the requirements outlined in the Statement of Work.
* Suppliers are required to provide commercial marine charts and publications that meet the Navigation Safety Regulations, 2020.

**Evaluation Criteria**
* Lowest Price.

**Contact Information**
* **Contact Name**: Bassam EL-DAYA
* **Contact Email**: [bassam.el-daya@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:bassam.el-daya@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone**: (343) 571-6911

**Notice URL**
* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33059/30004981-rfso---en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33059/30004981-rfso---en.pdf)
